reviews.text: The atmosphere of the restaurant outside is great - ideal for summer days. The food is good. The service was bad - we might have been unlucky with the waiter but there was not a single „bitte“ or „danke“ over the course of the evening - very grumpy. We were a group of eight and we weren’t asked if would like a refill once. The guy was quite unfriendly too.

We had diner at the restaurant. Location is great. Wine fantastic. Service does not meet the standards that charged price required.
Watch the amount they write on the credit card, because they put more than what you say!

We were there for lunch on the weekend. The place is perfect for chilling out on the sunny day. Service is top notch. The lady who was serving us was very nice and friendly. Nice Atmosphere. Food was delicious, not special but not bad. Parking spots in front of the restaurant is limited

The rating is for the restaurant. There is a huge outdoor area, when you have a nice weather is perfect to enjoy, your are next to the Main river.
The place is big enough if you want to go with a large group of people, just is better to do a reservation because at the time of my visit everything was full.
The staff is friendly and they are able to speak in English.
The menu is international but you will find many traditional German dishes from the Frankfurt area but as well all Germany.
The quality of the food is good and the prices are nice for what you get, including the location.
You can get as well traditional drinks from the area.

Waste of money and no Veg options and non alcoholic drinks

I will give zero rating
